delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.content:
Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action may cause:

  • All posts belonging to the account will be removed from our system.
  • The autopilot associated with the account will be paused.
delete_account.checkbox_content: Yes, I want to delete account

sidebar.title: Social Accounts
sidebar.limit_twitter_account: According to Twitter's announce, it's not allow to simultaneously post identical or substantially similar content to multiple accounts.
